name: 莊杏茹
objective:
Introduction to law
From fundamental concepts to emerging legal topics, a very approachable introduction in plain language was given to layperson-students in the class. The main objective of class provides an awareness and appreciation for the effect that law has on virtually every facet of modern life and society on comparative legal study perspective. The nature of the judicial process and the concept of law, both of which I'd recommend to students would be interested in jurisprudence. The cases and rules relate in analogical and deductive legal reasoning would be discussed in the classes. Core foundational ideas from which any student begins to build his/her knowledge and basic understanding and then application of legal reasoning.
materials: Introduction to Taiwan's Legal System 2015 March
